title: Rek'sai's QQQQQQQQQQQQ
body:
I think rek'sai should get a slow with her prey seeker thats slows for 50% for 0.75 seconds as her kit doesnt bring a slow and its hard to chase. 
Reply with what you think.

replies.body:
I think your a %%%%in idiot
So having a knockup, movemnt boost and stupid map control is not enough??
she doesn't need a slow shes insanely good atm
she has a movement speed boost with a knock up and a dash, i'd say she is ok for chasing
